title: Spy Thriller: Blood Feud: (A David Garrett Action Thriller)
features: Publication Date: January 9, 2015Dubai, 2015...Former CIA agent David Garrett never could walk away from a fight. But – after being out of The Game for a year - does he have what it takes for one last mission? David is committed to a blood feud and victory will not come easily. Danger and betrayal are everywhere he turns, and he finds the pursuit of justice has become an all-out war for his very life…If you enjoy gritty, action-packed thrillers, download a sample or buy BLOOD FEUD now.Blood Feud is a David Garrett action adventure suspense thriller published by Fight Card Books."This one-two punch from Tim Tresslar has a power not seen since Ali beat Frazier. Blood Feud is a smoking-hot thriller guaranteed to hit so hard you'll see stars the next day still. Go get it--and prepare to stay up all night reading. Yeah, it's that good." --Bestselling author Shane Gericke, The Fury
description: "Tim Tresslar's entry into the Jack Tunney Fight Cardseries packs a wallop, with a troubled protagonist you want to root for andjust the right balance of action and emotion to keep the reader riveted to thepage. Buy it. Read it. I know you'll enjoy it." --

,author of Trial Junkies "This one-two punch from Tim Tresslarhas a power notseen since Ali beat Frazier. Blood Feud is a smoking-hot thriller guaranteedto hit so hard you'll see stars the next day still. Go get it--and prepare tostay up all night reading. Yeah, it's that good." --Bestselling author

, The Fury"In BLOOD FEUD, Tim Tresslar takes the reader on aslam-bang rocket ride. David Garrett - a former CIA Agent - is working the MMAcircuit on his own, partly to make a living, more penance for a blown operationin Iraq. When the chance for revenge comes along, Garrett and his former loverand co-agent Melissa play a million to one shot to get even. The boxing scenesare real enough to make the reader pour sweat, and Garrett's search forredemption is genuine. Indulge yourself and read this; it's one hell of astory!" -

, author of SPIDER'S KISS, SPIDER'S DANCE, andothers."I smelled the blood and sweat in the ring, heard the whiz ofpassing bullets, and left scorch marks turning pages. Yeah, Tim Tresslar is thatgood!" --

, author of FED"From the first line to the last line in BLOOD FEUD thereader is grabbed by the collar and yanked into the story, and isn't letgo until the last page. The pacing lends itself to a book that will have youturning the pages in anticipation to find out how the conflict, and the storywill unfold." -
, author of WHAT A GIRL WANTS

Tim made his reputation as one of the authors behind Don Pendleton's bestselling Mack Bolan action thrillers from Gold Eagle Books, including entries for the EXECUTIONER, STONY MAN, and MACK BOLAN lines.His thrillers include JUSTICE RUN, BLOOD VENDETTA and REVOLUTION DEVICE, among several others. He is also the author of BLOOD FEUD, his entry in the Jack Tunney FIGHT CARD series from Fight Card Books.A former newspaper man, Tim lives in Dayton, Ohio. He has studied intelligence, intelligence analysis, terrorism and CBRN weapons.
store: Tim Tresslar (Author),  Paul Bishop (Editor),  Jack Tunney (Editor)

Dundee, Robert Randisi, Bishop, and Odom. Also included in the Fight Card series are two spin-off brands, Fight Card MMA and Fight Card Romance.', "The books in the Fight Card series are 25,000 word novelettes, designed to be read in one or two sittings, and are inspired by the fight pulps of the '30s and '40s - such as Fight Stories Magazine - and Robert E. Howard's two-fisted boxing tales featuring Sailor Steve Costigan.", 'Each of the novellas is short, sharp and packs a punch.', 'FOR MORE VISIT www.fightcardbooks.com']}
